about_the_game:
Set Content
This set unlocks the new playable character Seofon and comes with useful items to get him started.

• Spirit Edge's Rally Seofon-Unique Sigil
• Supreme Weapon Essence x 3
• Damascus Ingot x 5

The full game is required to use this content. You may also need to update the game to the newest version.

Downloaded content can be obtained by visiting the Knickknack Shack in game and selecting Claim Add-Ons.
detailed_description:
Set Content
This set unlocks the new playable character Seofon and comes with useful items to get him started.

• Spirit Edge's Rally Seofon-Unique Sigil
• Supreme Weapon Essence x 3
• Damascus Ingot x 5

The full game is required to use this content. You may also need to update the game to the newest version.

Downloaded content can be obtained by visiting the Knickknack Shack in game and selecting Claim Add-Ons.
